parameters.content:
## 📦 **Section 1: Data Collection Stage**

**(Nodes: 1️⃣ Schedule Trigger + 2️⃣ Fetch Domain List)**

### 🔁 1. Weekly Automation Trigger

🕘 **Node Name: `Weekly Summary Trigger`**
⏰ **What it does:**
This node kicks off the entire workflow **automatically every Monday at 9 AM** — no manual work needed!

💡 **Think of it like a morning alarm** for your workflow. Every week, it starts the process so you never forget to analyze the tech stacks again.

---

### 📄 2. Read Domains from Google Sheets

🗂️ **Node Name: `Fetch Domain List`**
📥 **What it does:**
This node goes into your **Google Sheet** and pulls a list of ecommerce **website domains** (like `nike.com`, `asos.com`, etc.)

🔗 *You just need to keep updating your Google Sheet whenever you want to analyze new ecommerce websites.*

---

### ✅ **Summary of Section 1:**

This section **automates the start** and pulls the **input data (website list)** from a central, editable place (Google Sheets).

---

# 🧠 **Section 2: Tech Stack Intelligence Stage**

**(Nodes: 3️⃣ Get Tech Stack + 4️⃣ Parse Tech Info)**

### 🌐 3. Fetch Tech Stack via BuiltWith

🔧 **Node Name: `Get Tech Stack (BuiltWith API)`**
📡 **What it does:**
This node sends each domain from the sheet to [BuiltWith](https://builtwith.com) — a powerful tool that tells you **which technologies** a website is using.

💬 For example:
`nike.com` → Shopify, Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.

📬 It does this using a GET request from BuiltWith’s API endpoint:

```
GET https://api.builtwith.com/
```

---

### 🧾 4. Extract Useful Info

🧮 **Node Name: `Parse Tech Stack Details`**
📤 **What it does:**
The raw response from BuiltWith can be messy. This node **cleans up the data** and pulls only what’s **relevant** — like ecommerce platforms, analytics tools, and payment gateways.

🔍 *It extracts only the gold from the data mine.*

---

### ✅ **Summary of Section 2:**

This section **fetches and organizes** advanced tech insights about each ecommerce site. No need for you to visit every site or dig through source code!

---

## 💌 **Section 3: Smart Summary & Delivery**

**(Nodes: 5️⃣ Generate Stack Summary + 6️⃣ Send Email)**

### 🤖 5. Generate Tech Summary with AI

🧠 **Node Name: `Generate Stack Summary (AI)`**
📋 **What it does:**
This is where the magic happens! It uses **OpenAI Chat Model** to analyze and summarize the tech stack for each domain in **clear, readable language**.

🧑‍💻 Instead of showing raw JSON or tool names, it says:

> *“Nike.com uses Shopify for its storefront, integrates Google Tag Manager for analytics, and uses Klarna for payment processing.”*

📈 You can easily forward this to clients, managers, or teammates.

---

### 📬 6. Email the Summary

📨 **Node Name: `Send Summary Email`**
📧 **What it does:**
Finally, this node **sends the generated summaries via Gmail** to a specified email address — or even multiple addresses.

💡 You can customize the subject, recipient list, and message format easily.

---

### ✅ **Summary of Section 3:**

This section turns complex data into **natural-language insights** and delivers them **automatically** via email. It's like having your own tech intelligence assistant!

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## 🧩 **Automated Tech Stack Reporting Workflow**

🎯 *Goal: Automatically fetch and summarize the technology stacks of ecommerce domains every week and email the summary.*

---

## 📦 **Section 1: Data Collection Stage**

**(Nodes: 1️⃣ Schedule Trigger + 2️⃣ Fetch Domain List)**

### 🔁 1. Weekly Automation Trigger

🕘 **Node Name: `Weekly Summary Trigger`**
⏰ **What it does:**
This node kicks off the entire workflow **automatically every Monday at 9 AM** — no manual work needed!

💡 **Think of it like a morning alarm** for your workflow. Every week, it starts the process so you never forget to analyze the tech stacks again.

---

### 📄 2. Read Domains from Google Sheets

🗂️ **Node Name: `Fetch Domain List`**
📥 **What it does:**
This node goes into your **Google Sheet** and pulls a list of ecommerce **website domains** (like `nike.com`, `asos.com`, etc.)

🔗 *You just need to keep updating your Google Sheet whenever you want to analyze new ecommerce websites.*

---

### ✅ **Summary of Section 1:**

This section **automates the start** and pulls the **input data (website list)** from a central, editable place (Google Sheets).

---

## 🧠 **Section 2: Tech Stack Intelligence Stage**

**(Nodes: 3️⃣ Get Tech Stack + 4️⃣ Parse Tech Info)**

### 🌐 3. Fetch Tech Stack via BuiltWith

🔧 **Node Name: `Get Tech Stack (BuiltWith API)`**
📡 **What it does:**
This node sends each domain from the sheet to [BuiltWith](https://builtwith.com) — a powerful tool that tells you **which technologies** a website is using.

💬 For example:
`nike.com` → Shopify, Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.

📬 It does this using a GET request from BuiltWith’s API endpoint:

```
GET https://api.builtwith.com/
```

---

### 🧾 4. Extract Useful Info

🧮 **Node Name: `Parse Tech Stack Details`**
📤 **What it does:**
The raw response from BuiltWith can be messy. This node **cleans up the data** and pulls only what’s **relevant** — like ecommerce platforms, analytics tools, and payment gateways.

🔍 *It extracts only the gold from the data mine.*

---

### ✅ **Summary of Section 2:**

This section **fetches and organizes** advanced tech insights about each ecommerce site. No need for you to visit every site or dig through source code!

---

## 💌 **Section 3: Smart Summary & Delivery**

**(Nodes: 5️⃣ Generate Stack Summary + 6️⃣ Send Email)**

### 🤖 5. Generate Tech Summary with AI

🧠 **Node Name: `Generate Stack Summary (AI)`**
📋 **What it does:**
This is where the magic happens! It uses **OpenAI Chat Model** to analyze and summarize the tech stack for each domain in **clear, readable language**.

🧑‍💻 Instead of showing raw JSON or tool names, it says:

> *“Nike.com uses Shopify for its storefront, integrates Google Tag Manager for analytics, and uses Klarna for payment processing.”*

📈 You can easily forward this to clients, managers, or teammates.

---

### 📬 6. Email the Summary

📨 **Node Name: `Send Summary Email`**
📧 **What it does:**
Finally, this node **sends the generated summaries via Gmail** to a specified email address — or even multiple addresses.

💡 You can customize the subject, recipient list, and message format easily.

---

### ✅ **Summary of Section 3:**

This section turns complex data into **natural-language insights** and delivers them **automatically** via email. It's like having your own tech intelligence assistant!

---

## 🌟 **What Beginners Can Do with This Workflow**

| 🛠️ Use Case            | ✅ Benefit                                         |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| 🧪 **Tech Analysis**    | Learn what tech stacks big ecommerce sites use    |
| 📊 **Client Reporting** | Automatically send insights to stakeholders       |
| 🧠 **AI Integration**   | Understand how LLMs can summarize complex data    |
| 🧩 **Automation**       | Master scheduling, APIs, and data flows           |
| 💼 **Freelance Growth** | Offer it as a service to marketing or dev clients |

---

## 🌈 **Conclusion:**

This workflow is a **zero-touch**, **AI-powered automation** for ecommerce tech stack analysis that beginners can adopt, modify, and scale for other industries too!

_metadata.name: Automated Weekly Tech Stack Reports with BuiltWith, GPT-4o & Gmail
